DSS_METRIC_VALUE_TYPES.METRIC_VALUE_NAME: Converting SQL statements from DB2 to SQL server

DSS_METRIC_DESCRIPTIONS.METRIC_DESCRIPTION: SQL language elements varaitons between Db2 to Sql server
Without adaptation, the SQL script won’t compile on SQL Server, leading to error

This quality rule searches for following SQL language elements inside SQL files: like CONCAT, ... The list of SQL language elements from DB2 to SQL Server searched can be configured in parsedefine.xml at the root of the extension. The Rulename is "SQL_language_elements".
Review the implementation and convert to SQL Server supported language elements.
Db2 migration best practices. https://www.sqlines.com/db2-to-sql-server#language-elements
Associated to each sql with violation, the quality rule provides: - The number of violation patterns - Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code
Number of DB2 SQL file.
Number of violation patterns found in DB2 SQL file, Built-in SQL Functions.
Data type mapping between Db2 to SQL server
Without adaptation, the SQL script won’t compile on SQL Server, leading to error

This quality rule searches for following Data type inside SQL files: BLOB, CLOB, DBCLOB, DECFLOAT, DOUBLE ,GRAPHIC, LONG VARCHAR, NCLOB, TIMESTAMP, VARGRAPHIC, NVARCHAR. The list of Data type searched can be configured in parsedefine.xml at the root of the extension. The Rulename is "Data_type_mapping".
Review the implementation and convert to language elements variations to SQL Server supported elements.
Db2 migration best practices. http://www.sqlines.com/db2-to-sql-server#data-types
Associated to each sql with violation, the quality rule provides: - The number of violation patterns - Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code
Number of DB2 SQL file.
Number of violation patterns found in DB2 SQL file, data type mismatch.
Db2 SQL functions variations between Db2 to SQL server
Without adaptation, the SQL script won’t compile on SQL Server, leading to error

This quality rule searches for following SQL functions inside SQL files: CHAR, CURRENT DATE, CURRENT_DATE, DAYOFWEEK_ISO, INT, LOCATE,SMALLINT, SUBSTR, USER. The list of SQL functions searched can be configured in parsedefine.xml at the root of the extension. The Rulename is "Db2_SQL_functions".
Review the implementation and convert to datetime interval expressions to SQL Server supported elements.
Db2 migration best practices. https://www.sqlines.com/db2-to-sql-server#built-in-sql-functions
Associated to each sql with violation, the quality rule provides: - The number of violation patterns - Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code
Number of DB2 SQL file.
Number of violation patterns found in DB2 SQL file, Datetime interval expressions language elements.
SQL SELECT statement variations between Db2 to SQL server
Without adaptation, the SQL script won’t compile on SQL Server, leading to error
This quality rule searches for SQL SELECT statement inside SQL files, and report a violation when any SQL SELECT statement is found.
Review the implementation and convert to SQL Server supported data types.
Db2 migration best practices. https://www.sqlines.com/db2-to-sql-server#select-statement
Associated to each sql with violation, the quality rule provides: - The number of violation patterns - Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code
Number of DB2 SQL file.
Number of violation patterns found in DB2 SQL file, Data Types variations.
CREATE DATABASE statement variations between Db2 to SQL server
Without adaptation, the SQL script won’t compile on SQL Server, leading to error
This quality rule searches for CREATE DATABASE statement inside SQL files, and report a violation when any CREATE DATABASE statement is found.
Review the implementation and convert to SQL Server supported SELECT statements.
Db2 migration best practices. https://www.sqlines.com/db2-to-sql-server#create-database-statement
Associated to each sql with violation, the quality rule provides: - The number of violation patterns - Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code
Number of DB2 SQL file.
Number of violation patterns found in DB2 SQL file, select statements variations.
CREATE TABLE statement from DB2 to SQL Server need to be refactored
Without adaptation, the SQL script won’t compile on SQL Server, leading to error
This quality rule searches for CREATE TABLE statement inside SQL files, and report a violation when any create table statement is found.
Review the implementation and convert to SQL Server supported statement type.
Db2 migration best practices. http://www.sqlines.com/db2-to-SQL Server#create-table-statement
Associated to each sql with violation, the quality rule provides: - The number of violation patterns - Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code
Number of DB2 SQL file.
Number of violation patterns found in DB2 SQL file, DDL type.

Without adaptation, the SQL script won’t compile on SQL Server, leading to error

Db2 migration best practices. https://www.sqlines.com/db2-to-sql-server#create-index-statement
Associated to each sql with violation, the quality rule provides: - The number of violation patterns - Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code
Number of DB2 SQL file.
Number of violation patterns found in DB2 SQL file, DDL type.

Review the implementation and convert to SQL Server supported statement type.

Review the implementation and convert to SQL Server supported statement type.
Db2 migration best practices. http://www.sqlines.com/db2-to-sql-server#sql-statements
Associated to each sql with violation, the quality rule provides: - The number of violation patterns - Bookmarks for violation patterns found in source code
